bb929b86-66ee-41e1-94b5-66e5cc03ed11.title: Satisfactory
bb929b86-66ee-41e1-94b5-66e5cc03ed11.summary: Satisfactory is a first-person open-world factory building game with a dash of exploration and combat.

comments.text: Amazing game with lots of depth!
I love building factories in this game.

31aec88d-0591-4014-9149-f492b50479f2.title: Eve Online
31aec88d-0591-4014-9149-f492b50479f2.summary: EVE Online is a free-to-play community driven space MMO where players can choose their own path from countless different options.

comments.text: A bit hard to get into, but very rewarding.

93ae1a2b-40b2-4019-b9b1-a6735392e673.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
93ae1a2b-40b2-4019-b9b1-a6735392e673.summary: The Witcher 3 is an open-world RPG set in a dark fantasy universe where you play as Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter.

comments.text: Combat can be tough but rewarding.

48cd1b8e-7a7f-437a-89be-e06360d5b623.title: Factorio
48cd1b8e-7a7f-437a-89be-e06360d5b623.summary: Factorio is a game about building and managing factories in an endless 2D world with resource management and automation.

b9dcae17-5c9f-4f18-a5db-3762f2b3dd33.title: Stardew Valley
b9dcae17-5c9f-4f18-a5db-3762f2b3dd33.summary: Stardew Valley is a farming simulation game where you can grow crops, raise animals, and explore dungeons.

comments.text: So much to do, very charming.

f1a1e1c6-7b5b-4c4d-bcfa-5d2b9efaa3e1.title: Cyberpunk 2077
f1a1e1c6-7b5b-4c4d-bcfa-5d2b9efaa3e1.summary: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world action RPG set in Night City, a metropolis obsessed with power, glamour, and body modification.

comments.text: So much to do, very charming.
